channel.title: One error
channel.description:
im trying to add this code im following this tut [code]http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=1837&pid=8455&mode=threaded&start=#entry8455[/code]
[code]} else if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID) { //Name Anything client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; c.name of npc += 1;[/code]
but i dont no what to put in the c.name of npc += 1; part
if u could help meh thanks if i add this instead of that: [code]} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 795) { //thing client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; c.name of npc += 1;[/code]
i complie i get this error:
NPCHandler.java:928: ';' expected c.name of npc += 1;
1 error
how could i fix that, thanks

item.title: One error
item.dc:creator: @spon80 spon80
item.description:
@spon80 wrote:

im trying to add this code im following this tut http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=1837&pid=8455&mode=threaded&start=#entry8455

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID) { //Name Anything client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; c.name of npc += 1;

but i dont no what to put in the c.name of npc += 1; part

if u could help meh thanks if i add this instead of that:

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 795) { //thing client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; c.name of npc += 1;

i complie i get this error:

NPCHandler.java:928: ‘;’ expected
c.name of npc += 1;

1 error

how could i fix that, thanks
